products.name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt

products.description: Complete bamboo cutlery set with carrying case. Includes fork, knife, spoon, and chopsticks.

products.description: Stainless steel insulated water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24h or hot for 12h. Leak-proof design.

products.name: Eco-Friendly Sneakers

products.description: Natural alternative to plastic wrap, set of 3 different sizes. Perfect for food storage.

products.name: Bamboo Toothbrush Set
products.description: Set of 4 biodegradable bamboo toothbrushes. Soft bristles suitable for sensitive teeth.

products.name: Organic Hemp Backpack
products.description: Durable and stylish backpack made from organic hemp. Multiple compartments for organization.

products.name: LED Solar Garden Lights
products.description: Set of 6 solar-powered LED garden stake lights. Automatic on/off with dusk sensors.

products.name: Recycled Yoga Mat
products.description: Non-slip yoga mat made from recycled rubber. 6mm thickness for comfort and stability.

products.name: Organic Skincare Set
products.description: Natural skincare set with cleanser, toner, and moisturizer. Suitable for all skin types.

products.name: Upcycled Denim Jacket

products.description: Multi-compartment lunch box for plastic-free meals. Leak-proof with secure locking system.

products.name: Cork Yoga Blocks

products.name: Eco Cleaning Kit
